text: Abdelmalek Droukdel (; 20 April 1970 - 3 June 2020) also known by his nom de guerre as Abu Musab Abdel Wadoud (), was the emir leader of the Algerian Islamic militant group Al-Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb (AQIM). He was born in Meftah, Algeria. His death was announced on 5 June 2020 that Droukdel, and members of his inner circle, had been killed by its forces in an operation in the north of Mali two days earlier. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Algerian military people Category:Al-Qaeda people Category:Deaths by firearm Category:Terrorists
title: Abdelmalek Droukdel
